title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: GTA V is an open-world action game where players explore Los Santos, pull off heists, and live the criminal life in stunning detail.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Experience the end of the Wild West era as Arthur Morgan in this breathtaking story-driven open-world masterpiece.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Cyberpunk 2077 is a futuristic RPG set in Night City where choices shape your story as a cyber-enhanced mercenary.

title: Elden Ring
description: Elden Ring offers a vast fantasy world filled with danger, mystery, and epic battles designed by FromSoftware and George R. R. Martin.

title: Counter-Strike 2
description: The next evolution of Counter-Strike delivers ultra-precise gunplay, competitive modes, and realistic visuals using Source 2 engine.

title: Valorant
description: Valorant is a tactical 5v5 shooter where precise aim meets unique agent abilities for intense competitive matches.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: Play as Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter searching for his adopted daughter in a world full of rich stories and dangerous beasts.

title: Assassin’s Creed Valhalla
description: Become Eivor, a Viking warrior exploring England’s Dark Ages, and build your clan’s legacy through raids and battles.

title: Battlefield 2042
description: Battlefield 2042 offers massive warfare with dynamic maps, advanced vehicles, and all-out chaos in large-scale multiplayer battles.

title: Forza Horizon 5
description: Explore Mexico’s diverse landscapes and race in hundreds of customizable cars in this stunning open-world driving adventure.
